about_the_game:
Build a candy factory to defend against waves of candy creatures!
A first-person tower defense factory building automation game.
Manage productions, build candy turrets, expand the island, and beat the waves!


  • Build candy turrets to beat waves of candy creatures to expand your factory!
  • Automate with conveyor belts to produce candies for turrets!
  • Expand the island by buying new cells to discover new biomes and resources!
  • Follow a tech tree to unlock new exciting turrets and production recipes!
  • Travel in style with jump pads, glider, factory boots, and jetpacks!
  • Immersive first-person perspective factory building!
  • Customize the color of your factory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050-TI or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements are an estimate for 30-60 FPS.
